Bacterium/Amobeous/Ramhorn/Breakdown/Hiss/Dark One/Nemesis Enforcer:



Bacterium and Amobeous, both in their microscopic 'beast' modes, began to 
slow down.

(I have permission from Crow Lord to use Bacterium)

Amobeous activated his internal comlink, his words in his mind going only to 
Bacterium, somewhat like telepathy.  <Hey, Bacterium, what the slag is that 
huge thing in front of us!  I can see slaggin' around it!>

<How in Primus' name should I know!  Slag, slag, slag!  We're gonna crash!  
WE'RE GONNA CRASH!> Bacterium screamed, Amobeous and himself slamming into an 
unknown object's lower abdomen, of course, they were so small nothing 
happened or could even be felt to the object (Plintissa) (and that's not 
moding, if a microscopic cell or something like that were to hit you while 
you were running, you wouldn't even notice).

==================

Ramhorn stepped onto the bridge of the Ark, gasping as he saw Ramulus, 
remembering how he had tried to help him, but was ganged up on by Predacons 
and couldn't do anything but watch him die.  "Y...you're alive!  But how?!  
That's impossible!"

==================

Dark One looked to Breadown and Hiss, his two minion srelaying Zardus' 
command.
"Do it." Dark One ordered, Breakdown and Hiss joining up with Nemesis 
Enforcer at the entrance/exit of the Alliance base, the three Alliance 
members heading for Zardus' coordinates.
